mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Callie McCraw
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Callie McCraw A. J. Hoback, Guardian B. P. Elliott, Clerk of Floyd County Court, Guardian ad Litem for Callie McCraw in the matter of A. J. Hoback vs. Callie McCraw Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 59, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
